alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 8:01PM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow and snow showers, especially Tuesday afternoon and evening. Total snow accumulations generally ranging from 4 to 8 inches, with lesser amounts below 5000 feet and locally higher amounts above 7000 feet. Southwest winds gusting to near 35 mph at times. * WHERE...Areas above 4500 feet near Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could led to very difficult travel across the high terrain. Areas of patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility at times. Hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 11 PM Tuesday: Payson 4 to 8 inches Pine-Strawberry 6 to 10 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
